name: Q REMASTERED
description:
The game made its big breakthrough in Japan in early spring 2023
Q REMASTERED, the masterpiece of physics puzzles, is now available on Steam!This game "Q" is a simple puzzle game that anyone can enjoy!
You can freely draw lines and shapes on the screen.
The drawn object will fall down due to gravity.
You will use the object to solve more than 1200 missions.
The solution is entirely up to you!

Can you get the ball out of the cup?
Can you hit the ball to the wall?
Do you know what the hell I'm talking about?
If you are confident, by all means take up the challenge!

In addition, the long-awaited new mode for the Steam version is the "IQ TEST" new mode!
How about your Q "IQ"?
A new mode, IQ TEST, is now available to visualize your Q"IQ" value!
You will be diagnosed with an IQ number and a graph analyzing you through a dedicated stage.

"Q" allows intuitive play with mouse and keyboard operation.
It also supports controller operation and SteamDeck touch operation for a variety of environments!
Numerous high difficulty achievements have been added, how many can you complete?
